section.p: Unseen hands try to remove the sceptre from your belt but you drive them off with a protective spell. Leaning down over the stream, you catch a glimpse of the god’s face shimmering there in the dark depths. He draws away, frightened by your power, and you are left with only your own reflection.

At last you understand the powers of the royal sceptre. It can be used as a weapon with a COMBAT bonus of +5 and also gives +5 to your other abilities (CHARISMA, MAGIC, SANCTITY, SCOUTING and THIEVERY) - but remember that ability bonuses from two different items cannot be added together.
Note the sceptre’s powers on your Adventure Sheet and then .
